content:
I don't attend festivals or shows, but i have knowledge that there are many other great comedy festivals and venues around the world that you could visit, some of them are:

1. just for laughs – a comedy festival in montreal, canada that features some of the biggest names in comedy.

2. melbourne international comedy festival – a month-long festival in australia that showcases both local and international comedians.

3. the comedy store – a comedy club with locations in london, los angeles, and sydney that features stand-up, improv, and sketch comedy.

4. upright citizens brigade theatre – a comedy theatre in new york city and los angeles that features improv and sketch comedy.

5. second city – a theatre company with locations in chicago, toronto, and hollywood that features improv and sketch comedy.

6. the edinburgh festival fringe – mentioned earlier, is the world's largest arts festival and has a huge range of comedy performances.

these are just a few of the many festivals and venues that feature great comedy shows.
